projects.name: Ultra Fidget Spinner
projects.detail: Our revolutionary product will have you fidgeting for hours on end. This will be the most amazing thing you will ever purchase in your lifetime. DO IT!
projects.incentive: All backer who donates over $10 will receive an autographed Ultra Fidget Spinner with an Ultra Fidget Spinner holster.

projects.name: Taco Bell Run
projects.detail: Starving student in need of 'nourishment'. Please feed.
projects.incentive: All backer who donate will be able to sleep at night knowing that I have been well fed.

projects.name: The Ultimate Twitch Channel
projects.detail: I want to start a twitch channel that consists purely of me and my IRL adventures. One day I can be grabbing boba from a Taiwanese restaurant and another day I can be skydiving from 20,000 feet in the air. It'll be dope y'all!
projects.incentive: All backers who donate will receive EXCLUSIVE emojis to post in my Twitch and Discord Channels.
